statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Avin has a string. He would like to uniform-randomly select four characters (selecting the same character is allowed) from it. You are asked to calculate the probability of the four characters being ”avin” in order.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line contains n (1 ≤ n ≤ 100), the length of the string. The second line contains the string. To simplify the problem, the characters of the string are from ’a’, ’v’, ’i’, ’n’.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Print the reduced fraction (the greatest common divisor of the numerator and denominator is 1), representing the probability. If the answer is 0, you should output "0/1".
